query: SELECT CASE WHEN content LIKE '%Table 1: Recommended CV Length%' THEN 'Caption found!' ELSE 'Caption not found' END as status FROM blog_posts WHERE slug = 'expert-cv-help-for-crafting-winning-resumes-effortlessly'
